# Fact
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel FACT(number): Returns the factorial of the given number.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `FACT`
